main event: Four white circular objects, approximately 3-4 feet in diameter, in a triangular formation, were sighted in the northern sky over Cedar Grove, New Jersey on September 10, 1964.
interesting points: The objects were traveling approximately west, disappearing from view in less than 15 seconds.
The objects were equally spaced, with an apparent separation of about 1,000 to 1,500 feet.
Visual contact was lost after approximately 45 seconds.
The sky was clear with slight haze.
The observer was a 31-year-old male with a scientific background (Chemist) and some previous experience on instrumentation projects.
sighted object: four white circular objects in a triangular formation
